name: S.O.A.P. Mission
description:
Play as Pensuke, the inflatable penguin, and fight for your Mistress against the evil S.O.A.P. Empire.

Enjoy our special dish, made by mixing the Breakout & Shmup genres.

How to Play:

Hold Button to Charge - Release the button to Strike with your inflatable body

Mash the button to revive

Made during the (Last) Epic Game Jam 2019.
